help-file.title: "STORNOGS SPHERES"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <victim> Aggressive: N/A Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster or until dispelled Type of spell: Protection
"Stornogs Spheres" brings into existence a series of orange spheres that rotate around the caster. These spheres absorb magical energies directed at the caster leaving him unharmed. The amount of energy the spheres can absorb depends on the casters' level.
